DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate difference incidence febrile episodes patient undergo stem cell mobilization chemotherapy filgrastim versus chemotherapy lenograstim . A febrile episode consider : body temperature > 38°C two measurement 24 hour interval 6 hour least two measurement .
DOC.brief_title: Study Incidence Febrile Episodes During Stem Cells Collection After Chemotherapy Patients With Multiple Myeloma
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age > 18 < 70 year 2 . Diagnosis multiple myeloma 3 . ECOG < 2 evaluated baseline , induction chemotherapy 4 . Indication mobilization high dose cyclophosphamide chemotherapy 5 . Normal blood count : neutrophil > 1500/μl ; platelet > 100.000/μl ; hemoglobin > 10 g/dl . 6 . Liver renal function : SGOT/AST , SGPT/ALT ; bilirubin < 1.5 time upper limit normal range ; creatinine < 2 time upper limit normal range . 7 . Interval previous induction chemotherapy high dose chemotherapy 30 60 day 8 . ECG e/o Echocardiogram within age relate normal range 9 . Negative HCV HbsAg 10 . Must willing able fill patient 's diary 11 . Written inform consent 1 . Documented and/or suspected infection 2 . Uncontrolled concurrent illness 3 . Documented cardiac dysfunction
